text: Jamie Lloyd Whitten (April 18, 1910September 9, 1995) was an American politician. He served as a United States Representative from Mississippi. He was the second-longest serving U.S. Representative ever and the fifth longest serving U.S. member of Congress ever. ==Other websites== *NNDB profile Category:1910 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Deans of the United States House of Representatives Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:United States representatives from Mississippi Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Jamie Whitten
